name: XLDeployRelease
friendlyName: Deploy existing package with XL Deploy
description: Deploy an existing package that is uploaded to XL Deploy.
author: Maarten van Diemen
helpMarkDown: This release task enables you to create and start a deployment.

inputs.name: action
inputs.label: Action
inputs.helpMarkDown: Action to be perfomed by the build task. This is whetever the application that will be deployed is coupled that a build (linked artifact).

options.Deploy application not created from buil: Deploy application not created from build

inputs.helpMarkDown: The XL Deploy server generic endpoint.
inputs.label: XL Deploy Endpoint
inputs.name: connectedServiceName

inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the builddefinition that created the application that must be deployed
inputs.label: Builddefinition
inputs.name: buildDefinition
inputs.visibleRule: action = Deploy application created from build

inputs.helpMarkDown: The version of the application that must be deployed
inputs.label: Application version
inputs.name: applicationVersion
inputs.visibleRule: action = Deploy application not created from build

inputs.helpMarkDown: The location of the application that must be deployed in XL Deploy, without the 'Applications/' prefix.
inputs.label: Application location
inputs.name: applicationLocation

inputs.helpMarkDown: Environment name as specified in XL Deploy, without the 'Environments/' prefix.
inputs.label: Target Environment
inputs.name: targetEnvironment

inputs.helpMarkDown: Invoke a rollback in case of deployment failure.
inputs.label: Rollback on deployment failure
inputs.name: rollback
